total-budget.period-start: The budget provided relates to funding disbursed to 2013 Stars Impact Award winners. Funding is available from January 2014 and is dependent on the submission and agreement of a plan and budget.
total-budget.period-end: The budget provided is the total amount of funding budgeted to be disbursed. The period end is one year after funding is available and matches Stars' accounting procedures - however, recipient organisations are able to spend their funding over a three year period.

document-link.title: The Stars Foundation - Annual Report for Year Ended 31 July 2012
